Science Mom

Oil Cube vs. Ice Cube
Time: 30 - 60 min Supplies Concepts Guide
Water, Oil, Ice cube tray, Freezer Density (Physics); Changes of state (Chemistry)
Frost Wedging
Time: 2 - 4 days Supplies Concepts Guide
Containers, balloons, Plaster of Paris, Water, Freezer Changes of state (Chemistry), Force (Physics),
Instant Slushy
Time: 2 - 3 hours Supplies Concepts Guide
Bottled soda, Freezer, Ice Supercooling of liquids (Physics and Chemistry), Changes of state (Chemistry)
Lift Ice with Salt
Time: 10 - 20 min Supplies Concepts Guide
Ice, Salt, Matches or Toothpicks or String Changes of state (Chemistry), Thermodynamics
Freeze Ice Cream in a Can
Time: 1 hr Supplies Concepts Guide
2 cans of different sizes with lids, Ice, Salt, Ingredients for Ice Cream (Coconut milk, dates, cocoa powder), Duct tape Changes of state (Chemistry), Thermodynamics
Ink Chromatography
Time: 30 - 90 min Supplies Concepts Guide
Markers, Paper towels, Water Separation of compounds based on rate of movement (Chromatography), Solubility (Chemistry), Capillary Action (Chemistry)
Walking Water
Time: 1 - 4 hrs Supplies Concepts Guide
5 cups, 4 paper towels, Water, Food Coloring Capillary Action (Chemistry), Siphons (Physics), Gravity
Straw Siphon
Time: 10 - 20 min Supplies Concepts Guide
Bendable drinking straws, Cups, Water Siphons (Physics), Momentum (Physics), Gravity
Fountain in a Bottle
Time: 30 - 90 min Supplies Concepts Guide
Plastic Bottle, Plastic Tubing, Drill or knife, Glue and Tape Siphons (Physics), Momentum (Physics), Air Pressure (Physcis), Gravity
Water Drops on Waxed Paper
Time: 10 - 30 min Supplies Concepts Guide
Water; Waxed Paper; Dropper; Food Coloring; Toothpick; Soap; Surface Tension of Water (Chemistry); Surfactants (Chemistry)
Water on a Coin
Time: 10 to 30 minutes Supplies Concepts Guide
Water; Coin; Dropper; Surface Tension of Water (Chemistry)
Pepper Scatter
Time: 10 to 30 minutes Supplies Concepts Guide
Water; Bowl or cup; Concentrated Dish Soap; Pepper Surface Tension of Water (Chemistry); Surfactants (Chemistry)
Soap Boat
Time: 10 to 30 minutes Supplies Concepts Guide
Water; Bowl or cup; Concentrated Dish Soap; Pepper Surface Tension of Water (Chemistry); Surfactants (Chemistry)
Floating Pin
Time: 10 to 30 minutes Supplies Concepts Guide
Water; Bowl or cup; Concentrated Dish Soap; Pepper Surface Tension of Water (Chemistry); Surfactants (Chemistry)
Floating Paperclip
Time: 10 to 30 minutes Supplies Concepts Guide
Water; Bowl or cup; Concentrated Dish Soap; Pepper Surface Tension of Water (Chemistry); Surfactants (Chemistry)
Gravity Defying Lid
Time: 10 - 30 min Supplies Concepts Guide
Water; Cup; Plastic lid or piece of cardboard or cardstock. Balanced forces(Physics); Pressure(Physics); Cohesion of water(Chemistry).
Magic Screen
Time: 10 - 30 min Supplies Concepts Guide
Water; Jar with metal ring or cup and rubberband; Screen or mesh cloth; Lid or cardboard. Balanced forces(Physics); Pressure(Physics); Cohesion and surface tension of water(Chemistry).
Hot and Cold Water Cups
Time: 10 min to 6 hours Supplies Concepts Guide
Water of different temperatures; Identical-sized clear cups; Food coloring; Flat lid or cardstock. Density(Physics); Thermohaline circulation(Ecology); Lake turnover(Ecology).
